snippet: The company behind the tax preparation software said it had stopped processing returns because of fraudulent filings, then resumed with increased protection.
abstract: Intuit says TurboTax has resumed processing state tax returns after brief halt due to rise in filings with stolen personal information.
lead_paragraph: The company behind the tax preparation software said it had stopped processing returns because of fraudulent filings, then resumed with increased protection.

headline.main: State Returns Temporarily Suspended by TurboTax
